about_the_game:
About this game

"Oh no! I'm about to fall in love!" is a fully dynamic interactive video work that simulates love. You will embark on a journey of time and space, meeting seven beautiful women with completely different personalities in the first person. Dig into the stories hidden behind each beauty, whether they love or kill each other, save or give up, sweet or painful Which world would you ultimately choose in this chapter? Who will you ultimately choose to spend the rest of your life with?

Is she born with a heart like flowers and trees, facing the sun?


Is it because she loves you that she wants you?


Is she sweet and doting, sincere and bright?


Is it breaking the shackles and searching for her inner self?


Is she the one who maintains order and is cold and enthusiastic?


Is she gentle, resilient, self loving, and independent?


Is she the one who follows her heart and walks alone?


Product features

Time and Space Travel - "Oh no, I'm going to fall in love" creates a terrible universe, where you start a time and space travel with just one photo. The secrets behind every girl and the Time and Space Bureau are waiting for you to explore.

Pure Love Experience - The seven female protagonists in "Bad, I'm Going to Fall in Love" have different personalities and outstanding looks. The entire process is filmed from a first person perspective, allowing you to immerse yourself in real-life simulations. Every girl's eyes are only yours, allowing you to have a thrilling pure love experience.

The plot is rich - multiple branches, multiple endings, hidden storylines and Easter eggs, seemingly separate storylines, actually intricate and complex. The girl you like comes from which time and space, carries what kind of mission, your choice determines her ending, and you and her laughter and tears are created by you.

Live Performance - All seven female leads are beautiful college students, with numerous exciting filming highlights and behind the scenes stories waiting for you to unlock. The pure love plot of TV dramas can also come to you!

Seven girls with vastly different personalities are waiting for your guide - whether innocent and youthful, extreme love, lively and bright, brave and sincere, cold and passionate, gentle and resilient, or charming and alone. When the seven of them are around you at the same time, your inner OS may be: terrible! I'm going to fall in love!

content_descriptors.notes: The game’s story incorporates elements with mature themes, as well as occasional instances of nudity or pornographic content, which may not be appropriate for all audiences. However, the story in this game does not involve sexual assault/non-consensual sex; any similar scenarios should not be over interpreted. There is no depiction of drug use, though the use of banned substances might be inferred. Themes of self-harm and alcoholism could be interpreted by some players, so those who are sensitive to these issues should exercise caution when deciding to purchase and play the game.

detailed_description:
If you choose correctly, you will embark on a journey of pure love and dream making; If you choose to fail, you will be reduced to ashes.

About Us
We are a group of college students from Nanjing, from different majors, each with unique skills. Due to our love for media, we gathered together to embark on a journey of "self creating dreams"

Write at the end
Our story began on November 15, 2023, perhaps due to the magnetic field coming together. Starting from naming the characters, it took a month to complete the script. On December 15th, the script was launched, and the six screenwriters each claimed other positions, including director, producer, coordinator, cinematographer, art, and even one person holding multiple roles! Filming officially began on December 20th. During the filming process, there were many unexpected situations, and the six of them worked together to complete all the filming, taking two months to complete. During these three months, while completing our studies on campus, we worked together to shoot this game. Although it was tiring, no one gave up. Even if we got sick, we got up and completed the high-intensity work every day, encouraging each other to ultimately complete all the filming.

You guessed it right. After the shooting was completed, the editing, UI, art, Steam game development, and promotion were all done by our group of novices themselves. We searched for other successful cases online, completed the promotion, and created the account. Fortunately, our game is open to everyone and has completed the first stage of "self dreaming" journey!

Amidst the vast sea of people, grateful for meeting; Thank you for your love and for bringing me joy.
